column1: The city of Katihar hosts one of the most extravagant Durga Puja and Kali Puja celebrations in entire Bihar. Many pandals come to the city during these periods. Artisans from Kolkata are called for statue work of goddess Durga and allies.Katihar already has a significant Bengali population and this adds to the celebrations.
